channel.title: About Us on BloNo Young Catholics
channel.description: Recent content in About Us on BloNo Young Catholics

item.title: Chris Dunning
item.description: Leader Chris grew up as a cradle Catholic in Naperville, Illinois. His parents involved him with his parish from a young age going to mass and praying together every night. It wasn’t until college, that he really grew close to the Catholic church. While attending Illinois State University, he regularly attended the John Paul II Catholic Newman Center where he deepened his relationship with Christ through bible studies, eucharistic adoration, and retreats.

item.title: Katie Van Horn
item.description: Communications Coordinator Katie Van Horn is the Communications Coordinator. She works on BloNo Catholicâ€™s advertising through social media and parish outreach, as well as note keeping.

item.title: Nick Reichmuth
item.description: Social Coordinator Plans social and fellowship opportunities.

item.title: Niko Miranda
item.description: Treasurer Moved to Bloomington in April 2023 from Northwest Suburbs of Chicago. 25 years old, Hispanic, likes playing piano, found God in college. Currently working in manufacturing industry as a program manager since 2021.

item.title: Thaddeus Hughes
item.description: Media Designer Thad grew up and lives on a farm around Funks Grove, became a mechatronic engineer, and reinvigorated his faith when he joined a Melkite Catholic parish in New Hampshire. He enjoys making everything - cars to kombucha to icons, singing, and running a publication called Machinae Ex Deo, exploring how faith informs technological development.
